ygData.subject: Skulletron Is Back In Action Boys!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Skulletron noticed something in BrightBlade.  Something that was hard to tell, but easy if you thought hard.  BrightBlade was trying to fake the Maximals

Subject: Skulletron Is Back In Action Boys!!!

From: "dcoburn" <dcoburn@...>

::Skulletron::

	Skulletron noticed something in BrightBlade.  Something that was hard to
tell, but easy if you thought hard.  BrightBlade was trying to fake the
Maximals into letting her live.  Those Maximals were too compassionate. 
That was their major weakness!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

	He went into beast mode, and then connected his mind with Grimmler's. 
Then, he flashed up an image of BrightBlade standing tall, and a Predacon
symbol to her right.  Then suddenly, a big X was on the Predacon symbol,
and then the Xed Pred symbol diseappeared and a Maximal symbol came up
beside BrightBlade.  Then, Grimmler appeared in the image, standing on the
right of the Maximal symbol.  So now it showed BrightBlade and Grimmler,
with a big Maximal symbol in between them.  The Maxi symbol then turned
into a.......Big Heart!!!  The heart grew, and then BrightBlade and
Grimmler were standing inside the heart, kissing!!!!!!!!!  Then everything
disappeared, and the words "She Loves You!!!" showed up all over the place.
 Skulletron broke the link to Grimmler's mind now.  He had to act fast, and
make them love each other.  He connected with BrightBlade's mind, and this
time showed an image of all the Predacons beating BrightBlade up.  Then the
same image of BrightBlade and the Maximal symbol showed up.  After, that,
Skulletron sent into her mind the image of her and Grimmler kissing inside
the big heart!  It all disappeared as well, and then the words "You Are
Maximal!!!" showed up along with "He Loves You!"  Skulletron went stared,
and grinned, waiting to see his chaos begin.
